name: Lost Souls (D_Q_G, Catralitos, Draike, Nalurianne, Bá)
name_original: Lost Souls (D_Q_G, Catralitos, Draike, Nalurianne, Bá)
description:
"I still remember the day, clear as day: October 12th, 2021, Sophia’s 18th birthday, and the day everything changed. Overnight she was someone else. It was hard to notice at first, because it wasn’t immediate. Like she was trying to hide the change. But as weeks went on, she cared little for friends or family. She became someone else. She even broke up with me… But I couldn’t accept it. I’ve learned she moved to this new house. A mansion so big, I don’t know how she affords it. I’ve heard it might have been inherited, but by whom? Hers was not a wealthy family. I saw her step out of the house. And I will step in to uncover this mystery. For closure, and if I’m lucky, to get my Sophia back…"

Lost Souls is a narrative-driven first-person game, in which you explore the past of people who were robbed of their lives by a mysterious figure.

To play the game, move with WASD, look around with the mouse, interact with the Left Mouse Button, use highlighted objects with E.

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
